name: Moonshine Mania
description:
A Game Jam game made for Viborg Gamejam 2023, by @ThatRumme and @LeviMoore

Story

You are 2 farms in the 1920s under the prohibition. You have both made moonshine but got a tip that the cops are coming by for a check. You both try and roll the barrels of moonshine into eachothers warehouse to give the blame to someone else.

Gameplay

Game is 2player 1v1.

Get barrels into your opponents warehouse to score points.

Between each roll attempt, you can place between 1-5 objects and/or obstacles on the map to either make it easier or harder for either yourself or your opponent.

Controls (xbox controller)

Rolling:

Right trigger: Forward Acceleration

Left trigger: Backwards Acceleration

B: Break

Left Joystick: Turn

Build:

A: Place object

Left Joystick: Move object around

Dpad (left & right): Switch between objects

Misc:

R (keyboard): Reset game
